page.title: 14Housing Old and New
page.content: We both live on a council estate in Merry Hill. The estate is owned by the council but some people have bought their houses from the council. There used to be a farm which was demolished 7 years ago to build these houses. Near my house there are no roads but some grass where we play. There is a car park at the back of the houses. There is still one farm with a farmhouse which we can see from our house. Bernadette's road is called Buckley Road. This is an older part of the area where people have had council houses since about 1945. In my area most of the houses are semi- detached. The roads are narrow and most people have not got a drive or a garage so they park outside their houses. There is a park which has a playing field and some swings for children.
